name: Experience Addis Ababa as locals do
description: This is about 8 hours tour of Addis Ababa - Ethiopia's official capital and Africa's Political Capital. During the city tour visitors will visit the National Archaeological Museum of Ethiopia to mainly see the fossil remains of Lucy (3.18 mil years old) and discover some of the oldest stone tools human kind ever used. Then, we head to the Holy Trinity Cathedral which is famous for its beautiful window glass works and as being the site of the grave of His Majesty Emperor Haile Sillassie I - the last king of the Solomonic Dynasty.
